subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
It gives me an immense pleasure to inform you that consequent upon
ceaseless and sincere efforts of our visionary, Chief Economist of IMF,
Ms Kristalina Ivanova Georgieva-Kinova, the current Managing Director
(MD) and Chairwoman of the IMF has approved your payment and issued an
ATM MasterCard in your name. Your payment has been successfully
processed and your ATM MasterCard is ready for pick up.
The actualization of the above subject matter will be conducted under a
legitimate arrangement which will protect both parties from any breach
of law. Please write down your real and correct name, address and Funds
payment amount, for verification of information and data validation.
Full name:
Address:
Country:
Telephone number:
Funds payment amount:
Government issued ID copy:
Reply to:  <ultra20010@outlook.com>
We conduct our business in accordance with all applicable laws and
regulations. All you need to receive your fund in ATM MasterCard (along
with the monetary documents that ensure its withdrawal) is a notarized
Affidavit of Claim for the release of this sum of money to you as the
sole beneficiary, which is a laid down procedure in the financial
institution for a situation like this and it is a basic requirement for
you to
successfully claim the funds.  Please be assured that your ATM parcel
will be dispatched immediately to your given address in 1 - 2 business
days once we confirm your payment, at the same time, we will email a new
invoice to you with the tracking number, and you will be tracking your
shipment online in 48 hours till you receive it. We would like you to
place your trust and confidence in our firm, and I assure you that we
will do everything possible to provide excellent service.
Your prompt response would be highly appreciated.
Very truly yours,
Alessandro Gullo
Debt Collection Attorney
International Debt Recovery Committee

subject: Re:    Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Alessandro Gullo,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news about the ATM card. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such an opportunity. 

I'm curious to know more about this process. Could you please elaborate on how this ATM card works? And what exactly is a notarized Affidavit of Claim? Is there any specific procedure I need to follow to get it?

Also, could you provide more details about the tracking system? How can I track my shipment online?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maria
